attributes.action: Censoring Mr Tony Blair Through Law
attributes.additional_details: In the light of the very real evidence the nation has seen that Mr Tony Blair lied to parliament, lied to the nation and has shown no remorse, not handed himself to any authority to allow a full investigation to take place and not made any effort to better himself those who sign this petition wish him to be gagged in the media at the highest and lowest level to prevent his lies being seen in any light of credibility that media coverage may offer.
